comments.text:
OMG I'm going too! Let me be your 2PM guide girl ~

Jun.K : aka crazy daegu granpa, super hyper despite being the oldest member 
of the group, funny and likable, arguable the weirdest yet nicest. He 
composes and his voice is gold, he's the main singer. Just full of talent 
but is super underrated :'(

Taecyeon : aka Taec / OKTROLL / He's considered very manly but fans know 
he's really just a huge dork. Likes to troll the other members and staff. 
He's CEO to OkCat ( A cute little green cat franchise that he created and 
designed ) Has big ears and teeth but still hot. :B He's the groups main 
rapper. 3rd oldest. 

Nichkhun : Khun . Thai prince. He's thai and just a sweetheart. He's 
considered the visual of the group and still/used to be immensely popular 
within kpop and the hallyu wave because of his good looks. Like SNSD's 
Yoona, he's the equivalent. Second oldest. 

Junho : Hobutt. Hands down without a doubt has the biggest butt in the kpop 
scene. Look up hobutt, you'll see why. He's known for his charming eye 
smile and talent. Can both sing and dance well, as well as do acrobatics. ( 
Though all of 2PM was trained in tumbling and acrobatics, ) The boy is just 
seriously talented. 2nd youngest

Chansung : Giant Maknae / youngest member, People often mistake him for the 
oldest because he's huge. He has a long waist and likes to take his shirt 
off at concerts a lot, lol. He's also a huge dork like Taec. He loves 
Bananas and animals. Has the most contagious laugh, he looks so dumb when 
he laughs, but that's why we love him :')

Wooyoung : Woodong/Toshio/ Fake maknae. People often mistake him for the 
youngest. Like Junho, he can both sing and dance very well, his voice is 
like a beautiful whisper. He was often treated like the baby of the group 
back in the day. He's also a ssanti king, just look up his ssanti videos, 
him dancing to single ladies = gold. He's the visual dancer of the group ( 
him and Junho are the best dancers, just different styles ) He's just 
overall adorable. ( My ultimate bias :') ) 

Jay Park : :'( ex-leadja / aka old pink grandpa. Originally the oldest 
member of the group and leader, wasn't afraid of wearing pink. Ridiculously 
talented, he could sing, rap, bboy and do acrobatics. He's pretty wild and 
funny, was closest to Taecyeon and Wooyoung. He used to be the craziest 
too, I suggest you atleast watch one episode of WILD BUNNY, it was 2PM's 
reality TV show back when Jay was still with them, it was also the most 
popular reality group show back in the day. Everyone watched it, it won't 
fail to make you laugh. Anyway, he kinda has his own company now and is 
doing his own thing as a solo artist, all of his music is seriously good. 
Sometimes I'm sad he had to leave 2PM, but also happy, because then I 
wouldn't be able to listen to his amazing solo music today. 

And there you have it. I hope you enjoy the concert at Rosemont knowing a 
little more about each member :')

*~KSONG of the DAY~*
This song and mv are both hot. *2PM* is looking *sexy and so manly* I can't 
get enough of them. I love *'A.D.T.O.Y.'* cause it was the first ever song 
I heard from them and the song easily gets *stuck in your head*. Now for 
the MV well lets say the dancing has me *smiling ear to ear*. 

2PM may not be on my top list of groups I listen to, but I can say that 
they are still *on my radar*. Favorite songs: *'Hands Up'*, *'Come Back 
When You Hear This Song'*, *'Go Crazy!'*, *'Mine'*

*Watch the MV* you will notice a lady with 2PM. Why am I bringing up a 
lady? *Well that woman is playing them all.* If you notice at the end of 
the MV she has this *snake tattoo* on her left ankle and you see that 
tattoo with all the members. *Mind Blown!*

Check out *2PM - A.D.T.O.Y.*!^^
